bin/cbtsp.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /**********************************************************doxygen*//** @file
00002  * @brief   Constrained Bottleneck TSP heuristic.
00003  *
00004  * Runs the Constrained Bottleneck TSP heuristic on the given input file.  
00005  *
00006  * @author  John LaRusic
00007  * @ingroup bin
00008  ****************************************************************************/
00009 #include "common.h"
00010 #include "lb.h"
00011 #include "tsp.h"
00012 #include "btsp.h"
00013 
00014 /* Global variables */
00015 char *input_file = NULL;
00016 char *xml_file = NULL;
00017 char *tour_file = NULL;
00018 double length = DBL_MAX;
00019 int edge_infinity = -1;
00020 int random_restarts = 5;
00021 int stall_count = -1;
00022 int kicks = -1;
00023 int confirm_sol = ARROW_FALSE;
00024 int supress_ebst = ARROW_FALSE;
00025 int find_short_tour = ARROW_FALSE;
00026 int supress_hash = ARROW_FALSE;
00027 int deep_copy = ARROW_FALSE;
00028 int lower_bound = -1;
00029 int upper_bound = INT_MAX;
00030 int basic_attempts = 3;
00031 int shake_attempts = 2;
00032 int shake_rand_min = 0;
00033 int shake_rand_max = -1;
00034 int random_seed = 0;
00035 
00036 
00037 /* Program options */
00038 #define NUM_OPTS 20
00039 arrow_option options[NUM_OPTS] = 
00040 {
00041     {'i', "input", "TSPLIB input file", 
00042         ARROW_OPTION_STRING, &input_file, ARROW_TRUE, ARROW_TRUE},
00043     {'x', "xml", "file to write XML output to",
00044         ARROW_OPTION_STRING, &xml_file, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00045     {'T', "tour", "file to write tour to",
00046         ARROW_OPTION_STRING, &tour_file, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00047         
00048     {'L', "length", "maximum tour length",
00049         ARROW_OPTION_DOUBLE, &length, ARROW_TRUE, ARROW_TRUE},
00050     
00051     {'I', "infinity", "value to use as infinity",
00052         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &edge_infinity, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00053     {'r', "restarts", "number of random restarts",
00054         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &random_restarts, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00055     {'s', "stall-count", "max number of 4-swaps w/o progress",
00056         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &stall_count, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00057     {'k', "kicks", "number of 4-swap kicks",
00058         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &kicks, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00059     {'c', "confirm-solution", "confirm solution with exact solver",
00060         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &confirm_sol, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE},
00061     {'e', "supress-ebst", "supress binary search",
00062         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &supress_ebst, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE},
00063     {'S', "find-short-tour", "finds a (relatively) short BTSP tour",
00064         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &find_short_tour, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE},
00065     {'H', "supress-hash", "do not create hash table",
00066         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &supress_hash, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE},
00067     {'d', "deep-copy", "stores data in full cost-matrix",
00068         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &deep_copy, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_FALSE},
00069         
00070     {'l', "lower-bound", "initial lower bound",
00071         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &lower_bound, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00072     {'u', "upper-bound", "initial upper bound",
00073         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &upper_bound, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00074         
00075     {'a', "basic-attempts", "number of basic attempts",
00076         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &basic_attempts, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00077         
00078     {'b', "shake-attempts", "number of shake attempts",
00079         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &shake_attempts, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00080     {'1', "shake-rand-min", "min value for shake random numbers",
00081         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &shake_rand_min, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00082     {'2', "shake-rand-max", "max value for shake random numbers",
00083         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &shake_rand_max, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE},
00084         
00085     {'g', "random-seed", "random number generator seed",
00086         ARROW_OPTION_INT, &random_seed, ARROW_FALSE, ARROW_TRUE}
00087 };
00088 char *desc = "Constarined bottleneck TSP solver";
00089 char *usage = "-i tsplib.tsp -L max_length [options]";
00090 
00091 /* Main method */
00092 int 
00093 main(int argc, char *argv[])
00094 {   
00095     int ret = EXIT_SUCCESS;
00096 
00097     arrow_problem problem;
00098     arrow_problem_info info;
00099     arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params lk_params;
00100     arrow_btsp_fun fun_basic;
00101     arrow_btsp_fun fun_shake;
00102     arrow_btsp_result result;
00103     arrow_btsp_params btsp_params;
00104     
00105     double start_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00106     double end_time;
00107     double bbssp_time = -1.0;
00108     
00109     /* Read program arguments */
00110     if(!arrow_options_parse(NUM_OPTS, options, desc, usage, argc, argv, NULL))
00111         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00112         
00113     /* Try and read the problem file and its info */
00114     if(!arrow_problem_read(input_file, &problem))
00115         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00116     if(!arrow_problem_info_get(&problem, supress_hash, &info))
00117         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00118     printf("Num costs in problem: %d\n", info.cost_list_length);
00119     printf("Max cost in problem:  %d\n", info.max_cost);
00120         
00121     /* Extra processing for arguments */
00122     if(shake_rand_max < 0) shake_rand_max = 
00123         (problem.size * problem.size) + shake_rand_min;
00124     if(shake_rand_max - shake_rand_min < info.cost_list_length)
00125     {
00126         arrow_print_error("shake random interval not large enough");
00127         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00128     }
00129     
00130     /* Calculate a value for infinity if necessary */
00131     if(edge_infinity < 0)
00132     {
00133         edge_infinity = (info.max_cost + shake_rand_max) * 2;
00134         printf("infinity: %d\n", edge_infinity);
00135     }
00136     
00137     /* Initialize random number generator */
00138     arrow_util_random_seed(random_seed);
00139     
00140     /* Determine if we need to call the BBSSP to find a lower bound */
00141     if(lower_bound < 0)
00142     {
00143         printf("Solving BBSSP to find a lower bound... ");
00144         arrow_bound_result bbssp_result;
00145         if(!arrow_bbssp_solve(&problem, &info, &bbssp_result))
00146         {
00147             arrow_print_error("Could not solve BBSSP on file.\n");
00148             return EXIT_FAILURE;
00149         }
00150         lower_bound = bbssp_result.obj_value;
00151         bbssp_time = bbssp_result.total_time;
00152         printf("done!  BBSSP lower bound is %d.\n", lower_bound);
00153     }
00154     
00155     /* Setup LK parameters structure */
00156     arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params_init(&problem, &lk_params);
00157     if(random_restarts >= 0)    lk_params.random_restarts  = random_restarts;
00158     if(stall_count >= 0)        lk_params.stall_count      = stall_count;
00159     if(kicks >= 0)              lk_params.kicks            = kicks;
00160     lk_params.length_bound = length;
00161     
00162     /* Setup necessary function structures */
00163     if(!arrow_btsp_fun_cbtsp_basic(deep_copy, length, edge_infinity, &fun_basic))
00164         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00165     if(!arrow_btsp_fun_cbtsp_shake(deep_copy, length, edge_infinity, 
00166                                    shake_rand_min, shake_rand_max, &info, 
00167                                    &fun_shake))
00168         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00169     
00170     #define SOLVE_STEPS 2
00171     arrow_btsp_solve_plan steps[SOLVE_STEPS] = 
00172     {
00173         {
00174            ARROW_TSP_CC_LK,                 /* TSP solver */
00175            (void *)&lk_params,              /* TSP solver parameters */
00176            fun_basic,                       /* fun (cost matrix function) */
00177            basic_attempts                   /* attempts */
00178         },
00179         {
00180             ARROW_TSP_CC_LK,                 /* TSP solver */
00181             (void *)&lk_params,              /* TSP solver parameters */
00182             fun_shake,                   /* fun (cost matrix function) */
00183             shake_attempts                   /* attempts */
00184         }
00185     };
00186     arrow_btsp_solve_plan confirm_plan = 
00187     {
00188        ARROW_TSP_CC_EXACT,
00189        NULL,
00190        fun_basic,
00191        1
00192     };
00193     
00194     /* Setup BTSP parameters structure */
00195     arrow_btsp_params_init(&btsp_params);
00196     btsp_params.confirm_sol         = confirm_sol;
00197     btsp_params.supress_ebst        = supress_ebst;
00198     btsp_params.find_short_tour     = find_short_tour;
00199     btsp_params.lower_bound         = lower_bound;
00200     btsp_params.upper_bound         = upper_bound;
00201     btsp_params.num_steps           = SOLVE_STEPS;
00202     btsp_params.steps               = steps;
00203     btsp_params.confirm_plan        = confirm_plan;
00204     
00205     /* Solve BTSP */
00206     arrow_btsp_result_init(&problem, &result);
00207     if(!arrow_btsp_solve(&problem, &info, &btsp_params, &result))
00208     {
00209         arrow_print_error("Could not solve BTSP on file.\n");
00210         ret = EXIT_FAILURE;
00211         goto CLEANUP;
00212     }
00213     end_time = arrow_util_zeit() - start_time;
00214     
00215     /* Check */
00216     int k, u, v;
00217     int cost, max_cost = INT_MIN;
00218     double len = 0.0;
00219     if(result.found_tour)
00220     {
00221         for(k = 0; k < problem.size; k++)
00222         {
00223             u = result.tour[k];
00224             v = result.tour[(k + 1) % problem.size];
00225             cost = problem.get_cost(&problem, u, v);
00226             len += cost;
00227             if(cost > max_cost) max_cost = cost;
00228             if(cost > result.max_cost)
00229             {
00230                 fprintf(stderr, "FUCK. %s\n", input_file);
00231                 return EXIT_FAILURE;
00232             }
00233         }
00234         printf("CHECK Tour Length: %.0f\n", len);
00235         printf("CHECK Max Cost: %d\n", max_cost);
00236     }
00237 
00238     /* Output result */
00239     arrow_btsp_result_print_pretty(&result, stdout);
00240     printf("Initial Lower Bound: %d\n", lower_bound);
00241     if(bbssp_time >= 0.0)
00242         printf("BBSSP Time: %.2f\n", bbssp_time);
00243     printf("Total Time: %.2f\n", end_time);
00244     
00245     /* Tour output */
00246     if((result.found_tour) && (tour_file != NULL))
00247     {
00248         FILE *tour;
00249         char comment[256];
00250         
00251         if(!(tour = fopen(tour_file, "w")))
00252         {
00253             arrow_print_error("Could not open tour file for writing");
00254             ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00255             goto CLEANUP;
00256         }
00257         
00258         sprintf(comment, "CBTSP Tour (k = %.0f); Length %.0f, Max Cost %d.",
00259             length, result.tour_length, result.max_cost);
00260         
00261         arrow_util_write_tour(&problem, comment, result.tour, tour);
00262         
00263         fclose(tour);
00264     }
00265     
00266     /* Xml output */
00267     if(xml_file != NULL)
00268     {
00269         FILE *xml;
00270         if(!(xml = fopen(xml_file, "w")))
00271         {
00272             arrow_print_error("Could not open xml file for writing");
00273             ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00274             goto CLEANUP;
00275         }
00276         
00277         fprintf(xml, "<arrow_cbtsp problem_file=\"%s\"", input_file);
00278         fprintf(xml, " command_args=\"");
00279         arrow_util_print_program_args(argc, argv, xml);
00280         fprintf(xml, "\">\n");
00281 
00282         arrow_btsp_result_print_xml(&result, xml);
00283 
00284         fprintf(xml, "    <max_length>%.0f</max_length>\n", length);        
00285         fprintf(xml, "    <total_time>%.2f</total_time>\n", end_time);
00286         fprintf(xml, "</arrow_cbtsp>\n");
00287         
00288         fclose(xml);
00289     }
00290     
00291 CLEANUP:
00292     arrow_btsp_result_destruct(&result);
00293     arrow_btsp_fun_destruct(&fun_basic);
00294     arrow_btsp_fun_destruct(&fun_shake);
00295     arrow_tsp_cc_lk_params_destruct(&lk_params);
00296     arrow_problem_destruct(&problem);
00297     return ret;
00298 }
